name: Strings Synthetic
description: Synthetic string ensemble with slow attack and lush harmonics

performance.notes: Synthetic string ensemble using Algorithm 4 (complex parallel). Six operators create lush harmonics. Operators 1 and 2 are detuned carriers (1:1 ratio). Operators 3 and 4 (ratio 2) add brightness. Operators 5 and 6 (ratios 3, 4) add harmonics. Low modulation (indices 2-3) for smooth tone. Slow attack (0.4s) for swell. High sustain (0.8) for sustained notes. LFO adds vibrato (0.06 depth). Chorus adds ensemble width. Creates lush, synthetic strings.
performance.technique: Many operators for lush tone. Detuned carriers for width. Low modulation for smoothness. Slow attack for strings. LFO vibrato for warmth. Chorus for ensemble. Perfect for pads and leads.
performance.tip: Many operators = lush. Detuned carriers = width. Low modulation = smooth. LFO = vibrato. Chorus = ensemble.

algorithmDescription: Algorithm 4: Complex parallel structure with detuned carriers
